               "type": "added",

               "type": "added",

               }
            },

               "key": "setting6",
               "value": {

                     "key": "doge",
                     "value": {
                        "wow": {
                           "key": "wow",
                           "type": "changed value",
                           "value1": "",
                           "value2": "so much"
                        }
                     }

                  "key": {
                     "key": "key",
                     "type": "stayed"
                  },
                  "ops": {
                     "key": "ops",
                     "type": "added",
                     "value": "vops"
                  }
               }
            }
         }
      },
      "group1": {
         "key": "group1",
         "value": {
            "baz": {
               "key": "baz",
               "type": "changed value",
               "value1": "bas",
               "value2": "bars"
            },
            "foo": {
               "key": "foo",
               "type": "stayed"
            },
            "nest": {
               "key": "nest",
               "type": "changed value",
               "value1": {
                  "key": {
                     "key": "key",
                     "value": "value"
                  }
               },
               "value2": "str"
            }
         }
      },

         "key": "group2",
         "type": "deleted",
         "value": {
            "abc": {
               "key": "abc",
               "value": 12345
            },

               "key": "deep",
               "value": {
                  "id": {
                     "key": "id",
                     "value": 45
                  }
               }
            }
         }
      },
      "group3": {
         "key": "group3",
         "type": "added",
         "value": {

               "id": {

               }
            },
            "fee": 100500
         }
      }
